text: @NYDailyNews @CharlesMBlow What Georgia is suffering now needs to be labeled, named, & fully understood by every GA voter. It is called the KEMP CORONAVIRUS ACCELERATION CAMPAIGN. He is intentionally, with malice, killing innocent Georgians. He is inept, unfit, & in dereliction of his duties. A 45* mule.
